title: Floods hit South Africa’s KwaZulu-Natal province again
excerpt: The floods come only a month after torrential rains killed 435 people in KwaZulu-Natal.

title: Mozambique: Cyclone Gombe death toll rises to 53
excerpt: In recent years, Southern Africa has suffered repeated devastating cyclones that used to be relatively rare.

title: Mozambique announces new prime minister after cabinet reshuffle
excerpt: New ministers were named after a major reshuffle by President Filipe Nyusi.

title: Analysis: Can African gas replace Russian supplies to Europe?
excerpt: A lack of infrastructure, not capacity, could hurt the continent’s plan to supply gas to Europe in Russia’s stead.

title: Dozens dead from Tropical Storm Ana in southern Africa
excerpt: At least 70 killed in storm that struck Madagascar, Mozambique and Malawi as authorities scramble to repair damages.

title: Southern Africa bloc SADC extends Mozambique mission
excerpt: Regional body says progress made against rebels in Cabo Delgado province since troops deployed last year.

title: Start Here
excerpt: Why people in Madagascar are starving.

title: In Mozambique, Kagame says Rwandan troops’ work not over
excerpt: Rwandan president says his country’s force will help secure and rebuild Cabo Delgado areas destroyed by armed campaign.

title: Rwanda, Mozambique forces recapture port city from rebels
excerpt: Mocimboa da Praia, home to one of Africa’s biggest natural gas projects, retaken from rebels, Rwandan army says.

title: Rwanda deploys 1,000 soldiers to Mozambique’s Cabo Delgado
excerpt: Gov’t says deployment at request of Mozambican authorities aimed at restoring state control in conflict-hit province.

title: Southern African nations agree to deploy forces to Mozambique
excerpt: The SADC Standby Force will support Mozambique ‘to combat terrorism and acts of violent extremism’ in Cabo Delgado.

title: Visualising 70 years of refugee journeys
excerpt: On World Refugee Day, Al Jazeera looks at the painful journeys refugees were forced on in 2020 despite global pandemic.

title: Dozens of children, mostly girls, abducted by Mozambique fighters
excerpt: Save the Children says 51 minors taken by armed groups in Cabo Delgado in 2020, a figure likely an underestimate.

title: White people rescued before Black people in Palma: Amnesty
excerpt: Rights group alleges white contractors airlifted to safety before local Black people after raid on Mozambican town.
